name: Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster
name_original: Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, German, Spanish.  Join Cookie Monster, Elmo and other Sesame Street characters as they explore a living storybook titled “Once Upon a Monster.”   In this uplifting and whimsical family adventure game, kids and parents will meet zany new monster friends as they help them solve problems, forge friendships, and learn important life lessons along the way.  Exclusively on Kinect for Xbox 360.
